lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The new book, Mordenkainen's Tome of Foes, releases tomorrow. I got one last month and it's amazing. Oh my god, it's so good. It has the Astral Dreadnought, I'm so happy. Hope you guys never have to fight one. You can order that now on D&D Beyond and check out the wonderful content there. If you order on D&D Beyond, you also receive the Rrakkma Adventurers League gith-focused introductory adventure for free. If you know what that means, we're of like mind. The githyanki is such an amazing part of D&D lore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go Yankees!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go Razi! Anyway, as a reminder, Tome of Foes is also available in D&D Beyond's legendary bundle, which is still 25% off using the code 826LA. If you want it to do the legendary bundle, get the huge discount, Tome of Foes is included in that, so go and check it out. It's amazing. Thank you, D&D Beyond, and hope you enjoy the new release tomorrow. Sam? You want to talk about our other sponsor for the evening?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, Backblaze stores docs, music, photos, videos, fanart, and more. I use the service, and to be honest, I always thought, "It sounds magical." Well guys, I've discovered that it is actual magic. Faery magic to be exact; In fact, I captured one of their head faeries, Yev, a little sprite named Yev, in this trash bag.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look at him flittering around!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Flits around a lot. He's just settling down in here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There is no air hole; that's so irresponsible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's okay! Oh look! Magic is real! I have it right here in the bag! Yev, how does Backblaze work?

lines.name: TOYINBAG
lines.text: (bird tweeting)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! He says you can restore files anywhere via direct download.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you think that was going to be loud enough?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shh. I've got a backup if it doesn't work. He says you can restore files anywhere via direct download, or restore by mail and receive a hard drive with your files. Yes, Yev, but how does Backblaze keeps all those backups for such a low price?

lines.name: TOYINBAG
lines.text: (garbled speech imitation) (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait! Yev says that they harness the power of love to store data and that love also sustains your life? Wait a second, without your love, you'll die?! Oh my god!

lines.name: TOYINBAG
lines.text: (squealing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god, everyone! Yev is sick!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe the power of our applause will cure him. Everyone clap. Oh my god no, it's made it worse! His lung has collapsed. He's bleeding internally. Oh my god, what can we do?! He says that not enough people have visited backblaze.com/criticalrole.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're shaking it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's him shaking, it's not me. My puppetry work is amazing.

lines.name: TOYINBAG
lines.text: (squealing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not enough people have visited backblaze.com/criticalrole to sign up to get a 15-day free trial. Critters! If you want Yev to live, you need to click on the site right now! Oh god! Oh god, he's flatlining. He's dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yev is dead! The Backblaze faery is dead.

lines.name: TOYINBAG
lines.text: (squealing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! What?! It's a miracle!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't clap!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Enough critters visited backblaze.com/criticalrole and signed up. You saved his life! We can continue the show.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are a master at building tension.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Puppetry. That was a real faery, guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Jim Henson studio was mad to let you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How you ever snagged it with just a kitchen garbage bag is beyond me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's thrifty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A child's lightsaber toy thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't ruin the illusion!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why do you show your tricks?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, stop it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so quiet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, it's too quiet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The faery escaped and left us presents.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a dragon. Oh no, it ran out of batteries! Everyone clap! Yeah, it's alive!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My face hurts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam, and thank you, Backblaze, for your amazing support. Getting us on track here, we have the Vox Machina: Origins hardcover that will be on sale next week on 5/31. Very soon, on May 31st, you can find it on the Geek & Sundry online shop, check out all the details on critrole.com.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's beautiful!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty awesome, we're excited.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's gorgeous on paper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're happy to bring it to you physically guys and not just digitally, so check out that. We have the Stream of Many Eyes coming up with our friends at Dungeons & Dragons. The event starts June 1st and if you're in LA, you can check out the show live and in-person. Check out dnd.wizards.com/some. Stream of Many Eyes for more info and tickets. Ashley will be there playing in my game on Friday. Me and Marisha, Sam, Travis, and Taliesin will all be participating in the stream as well. Check it out throughout the weekend. There is a lot of guests coming in there playing some D&D and unveil Wizard's next big story.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somebody wasn't asked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that true?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This girl right here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oops.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay, you've got stuff going on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, there are other things happening.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Human growing in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I totally was like, "Nobody asked me." All the oops. Sorry guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see you guys there. Some of you. We have our fantastic Talks Machina every Tuesday at 7:00pm Pacific. Our fantastic host and maestro of cabbages, Brian W. Foster, will be there with a few guests from the show to discuss the events of tonight's episode. It will be available on Twitch and Project Alpha so go check it out there. Also, a reminder for Twitch Prime: If you have an Amazon Prime account, you can sign up to subscribe to a channel on Twitch for free every month, if you manage to merge the two accounts together with your Twitch Prime and Amazon Prime. So yay! The Critical Role Live dice sets are currently back in stock and in the store.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, and if they're still there, the Vox Machina dice set is around as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! I tweeted it out because I was like, "No one told me that one was in"! That's exciting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello and welcome back! Wow, you're going back to basics tonight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mighty Nein, having just returned to the Leaky Tap, being briefly met with Kara who delivered this information and then vanished back into the afternoon, what would you like to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Autocorrect. Inside story. Inside joke. Whatever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The inside story.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I think we should go talk to him. That seems like it would be smart, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and we already signed one contract with him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's not like he wouldn't know where we went if we left, anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What time of day is it right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If I recall, it's later afternoon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is my voice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm dialing it in still. (vocalizes trying to find Nott's voice)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we got there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A little more mid, a little less treble.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's late afternoon, I believe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can head over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I get nervous spending too much time in one place, but if everyone's going, then we're going.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like a step in the way out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if what he wants us to do means that we have to stay here for a while, though?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then we'll have to make it worth our while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like for a lot of money, would you stay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eventually, you're going to want to walk away from the table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if the table offers you four times the amount you've ever seen?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The table always offers you four times the amount you've ever seen. You got to walk away while you're winning. But all right!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we'll make a decision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is mid-craze scuffle at the moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a fight club! You guys, it's a fucking fight club!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau is in her element.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His low guttural grunt come through his protruding jawline with a (grunt) and gives you a sign to continue inward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How have you been, Kutha?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, me too, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You recognize them, one is Louis, one of the agents who fled from the research facility that you were then going after, and the other is Thed, the halfling fellow with the neck tattoo that you saved in the sewers not but a week and half earlier. They are both bloodied--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The one we got the information from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! I remember he was trapped down by the spider.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The first guy's name was Louis?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Louis and Thed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. They are both bloodied and tensely attempting to pummel the other into unconsciousness. The people seem to be happily cheering it on as they go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, who was Louis?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: From the research facility?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There were three people that went there and fled the research facility.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The ones we made fun of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Woo, go Thed!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, that's right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Research facility?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to jump up on the table and watch it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The ones that we hazed. The Gentlemen's guys that we talked to before we went to go kill the will-o'-wisps.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Louis uses the opportunity to go forward and sweep his legs out from under him. As he hits the ground, chest up, he goes into a double handed hammer fist right down into Thed's chest. The air escapes him. Once again, the crowd goes "Oooh!" There's a slight in the back from the Gentlemen, who's trying to watch over the shoulders of everybody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jump up on the table, you can see better!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His smaller halfling form able to dexterously dodge out of the way. He's got one eye partially open, the other one watering thick, and he waits and paces himself for a moment. Louis, however, follows up behind it very quickly and goes for a knee straight to Thed's face. It slams in, and as he backs up you can see the nose is permanently pushed to one side, and blood is pouring down the front of his face. He has a hand up. You can't tell if he's going to say he's going to stop or if he's trying to defend, and there's no one looking over this battle to stop it if it happens.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I turn to Mollymauk and say: I got three gold on Thed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seems a little late for a wager at this point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just you and me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fair, I'm in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediately there's a (choking) and he's holding him to the ground and jamming and grinding his heel into his throat. Everyone's shouting, "Get him!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Finish him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we stop this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Why would you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Louis is desperately trying to pull the boot of Thed up off his throat, but Thed's able to keep it down. He's pushing and pushing. He spits blood right in the face of Louis, like onto one of his eyes. The consciousness of Louis begins to fade, eyes roll back, and then eventually, as the rest of his body goes limp, they pull Thed off. "Yeah!" They cheer and lift him up and carry him off. They pull Louis up into a chair and start slapping him and pour water in his face. He comes to consciousness and spits out a tooth, and then the crowd's energy begins to die down a bit, and they drag them to different sides of the room and the people being to go about their business, get another drink at the bar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that happen often in here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the fury of the small.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fight me!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fight me right now! Do you want to do it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're doing that, some of the crowd that had began to disperse suddenly turns and starts tapping each other.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are the rules?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just hit each other!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Do you wa-- Okay!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Round one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both charge into the center, starting seemingly with no purpose other then the necessary adrenaline to kickstart the rest of your evening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not like it hasn't happened before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you both to roll initiative.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Haste on Beauregard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You piece of shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I get to roll twice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I did. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay but-- Hold on, let me check real fast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's licorice. I just need licorice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did I notice him casting Haste?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't try to hide it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (Laughing) Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Saving throws, not ability checks. You don't get advantage on your initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel this sudden strange surge of adrenaline and energy. Time around you seems to slow ever so slightly as you watch Jester starting rushing in, swinging towards you, faster than you expect though. What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to punch her in the face and cast Inflict Wounds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh Jesus!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just got this!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At first level?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought we were having funsies!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At first level. I could do it at third, but I'm doing it at first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it's a relatively soft punch as you're using it as a delivery method for the spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you do have to roll to see if you connect, so a melee spell attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe that 3d10 necrotic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 3d10. I think so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's wrestle! Okay! Mace in your face!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Third level is like 5d10.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's thumb wrestle, and you shoot him in the head. Like what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy fuck balls!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suddenly your energy is instilled within your body, your vision goes wide, all the colors come into focus and you look up to see Jester to distract yourself from the sudden sensation you've never experienced before. The one thing you see is this fist connect with your chest, and you all watch as a series of blood vessels in the sides of Beauregard's face and neck suddenly burst and splash blood in different directions. You see white for a second. Your body racked with pain and you recoil briefly from the sudden shock to your system.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With this flash of action, I mask my voice and go: I've got five gold on the horny one!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The fuck, Jester?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Boom! Boom! Boom! I'm going to do some Ip man like (punching noises). Like all the way down her spine. Right in the fucking ribs. Yeah, going for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got two attacks now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is stress chewing on the licorice root that he used to cast the spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have your shield for this because you're fist fighting. So your AC is technically two lower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay the first one definitely hits with a 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The second one is a 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it doesn't hit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, and then I'm going to spend a ki to do stunning strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your AC normally?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Normally 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's cracking it out!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, wait, hang on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I should have done it 3rd-level!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll damage and then do I do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then she has to make a saving throw. I believe it's a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not great damage. Seven damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of bludgeoning damage as she begins to pummel you repeatedly, across the front of the face, down into the side of the torso, and I need you to roll a constitution saving throw please, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. Oh no.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You guys are fucking each other up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five! No! Six. Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as she continues down your torso there's one portion on the back of your armor where your spine is exposed beyond the clothing you're wearing, and after she finishes the round she uses the momentum and strikes straight into base of the spine where the nerve would divide down to the pelvis, and your entire body locks up, all your muscles all spasm at once. You are stunned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I have another attack action because of haste?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think I pooped myself a little.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk over to the other side of the crowd and go: I got ten gold on the one with the bandages! Trying to whip up a betting frenzy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What does haste does is it gives you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An extra attack action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An extra attack action, yeah. You have your bonus action so yeah. You can attack with your staff if you want to, whatever your main attack is and then you still have your bonus action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I still have my bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because my stunning strike didn't use my bonus action, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. That's not great. That misses. It was a natural four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on, she is stunned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh right! She's stunned!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You roll again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This hit you do pull back and hit the armor unfortunately, and your fingers snap back a bit, you feel the numbness from the attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was my shield!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You keep your shield in your ass?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ow! Then I have one more bonus action, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, that's good. That's 19 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's six bludgeoning damage to you. As Beau recoils from this and steadies herself from this round, Jester you are unable to move. You're sluggishly trying to get your joints to function again, you try and speak and it comes out in a stuttering phrase that fades away, your tongue not listening to your impact.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA, ASHLEY
lines.text: (chanting) Level five! Level five!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right in that sciatic nerve! Right in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, it hurts already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Too close to home.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beat that practice dummy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Back to Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to just do--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are no longer stunned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Once again take my staff out and I'm going to gut strike her right in the stomach. The first attack, that's a natural 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me double check and see when the actual stun wears off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'll take five. Five gold, I've got Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until the end of your next turn, so you still have advantage on attacks against her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's see if-- Okay, no. I'll take that 18. That first strike is 12 damage with my staff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of bludgeoning damage as the staff slams right into your clavicle, shoulder area, almost knocking you off your feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I'm supposed to state flurry of blows as my bonus, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I get one more attack and then I can do flurry of blows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use my reaction, because I'm not stunned, to use Hellish Rebuke on you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, you're still stunned until the end of her turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is what Jester thought.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second attack. Okay. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is still my regular attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is still the second strike with the staff after one knocking her back from the shoulder blow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do a six damage crack just right in her gut, knock the wind out of her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wind gets knocked out of you from a sudden blow to your stomach area.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm going to do flurry of blows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Blood curse of the eyeless. Full strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and take your damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On who?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of a sudden your vision goes black. For whatever reason where we saw the brief burst of the veins from the first strike from Jester, you watch as bits of crimson begin to pour out the corners of Beau's mouth, as her eyes go over black.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have advantage, it's just a straight roll for your attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, first one. 14.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second one. No, even worse, natural four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually your vision comes back, but your knuckles hurt from the fact that you just punched twice in the thickest parts of her breast plate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I have one more attack action, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because of haste, you do. Yes, and that one has advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm. 14, 20 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Another 12 damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww no! I'm unconscious!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was pretty good, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester got one good opening blow, and then--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then Caleb fucked me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, partially, but you also chose a fist fight against a monk, which is a rough scenario.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fight club!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The whole crowd goes, "Yeah!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester's unconscious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wait, I thought you were going to Fjord. I'm sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, she's our healer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can someone-- she's dying right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as one of the patrons of the bar comes up with a small jug of water and throws it in her face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (coughing) Whoa!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is she okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's at one hit point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was seriously awesome!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So awesome! Dude, what did you do? That was crazy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would have done it worse, but I thought we were taking it easy on each other and then you went crazy on me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I got a little blood lusty after that. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I understand completely. How come you were you hitting me so much though? Because usually you don't have that much speed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't really know. Do I know that he cast Haste on me? Would I be aware of that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not at the moment, no, and you're still affected by it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was a while ago.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Talking super fast. All coked up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's really great. I don't know. I feel really good about myself right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At about this point in the conversation, the adrenaline leaves your body, and you almost keel over. You become, suddenly, super lethargic and exhausted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groans) Oh god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Definitely the mushrooms.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to take a nap after this, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nah, we're walking out of this city, miles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah fuck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I send Frumpkin over to start lapping the blood off of Jester's face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, hi Frumpkin. You're a little, evil creature that drinks blood!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some seem to be down with it and are like, "Yeah, this is what it is about!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take my canteen and clean Jester up and trying to help her out. Now that the adrenaline's wearing off, I'm feeling a little guilty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's totally fine. I did it to myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sitting on one of the table edges, you see Dweez, the little creepy gnome who you met earlier, who's like, (breathy laugh).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't like him. That was creepy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, a familiar voice kicks up from the back corner, "Friends, come sit. Thank "you for such a fine display of sportsmanship."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's us. Always down for a scrap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His comfortable attire today comes in a billowing linen, a dark navy blue shirt that frills at the wrists. You can see his rings and jewelry available as his fingers are crossed and partially stapled-- steepled in front of him. Not stapled to him. That's a whole different thing. Ah! Oh god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use this time talking to him as a short rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT, SAM
lines.text: That's an hour.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, hopefully--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you for coming so quickly."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course. It didn't seem like our options above ground were all that plentiful. We were more than anxious to hear what you might offer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Rather tenuous times these are, wouldn't you say? Word is the breach of the Ashguard "Garrison was a massacre, and now the skies there hang dark with ill-magic. I'm glad that's hundreds "of miles from here, though. Now with the bulk of the military moving east, and the Crownsguard "stretched thin, we should begin bolstering our plots, yes?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, a distracted empire is an easy empire to bend to our will. Or at least, to not pay "attention to what we're doing."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: More manipulating it to your individual gain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I have no interest in political endeavors. Just the more confused they are, the "better for business."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have a few possible jobs here, if you're interested. I don't mean to act so quickly, but "word comes to me that you had been summoned to the King's Hall. I would hate to think I missed the "opportunity to get more work under your wing, before losing you to some unfortunate, state-based "conscription. First order of business, should you be interested." He leans forwards and sets his "glass a little further from the edge. His voice hushes a bit as he leans in, "I've some friends to "the north, whom I've been needing to reconnect with. Allies, who would be very profitable "partners in these times. I'm rather strapped for attention, at the moment, and I have a hard time "trusting some of these other louts with detailed missions!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He means Louis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway, if you have any interests--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking Louis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Indeed." You glance back over your shoulder and see Louis at the bar, who's still dazed and "drinking a giant cup of ale and wiping the blood off of his whole torso. "If you've interest in "making coin, doing some interesting work and getting to see most of our beautiful, imperial "countryside, I can go on."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja,

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "An old friend of mine, named Ophelia Mardun. She has a base of operations about 350 "miles northeast of here. Past Nogvurot and the Quannah Breach, on the outskirts of Shadycreek "Run. I'm sure you've heard of it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we have, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A sovereign town, outside of the Dwendalian Empire and outside of the law. That uses the "Savalierwood to keep the Crown at bay. Spoken of as a haven for criminals, thieves, murderers, but "really, it's home to the truly free entrepreneurs of Wildemount... and criminals, thieves, and "murderers. Now, Ophelia is unable to enact on any partnerships at the moment, as her current "business is tangled up in some of the local riffraff and she's requested aid in stabilizing "her situation. What I propose, as you've already proven yourselves effective problem solvers, "self-starters with enough sense of honor to see a deal through, is for you all to travel northward, "past the Silberquel Ridge to Shadycreek Run to parlay with Ophelia. Help her in absolving her "from her current mire of complications and return with her here to Zadash. For this task completed, "I offer an advance of 500 gold pieces and a purse of 4,500 gold pieces upon returning with Miss "Mardun within the month."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will she come willingly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She will, once you manage to free her from her predicament."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Complications, predicament, do you have any more specifics than that, perhaps?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sure once you speak to her, you'll have better information on that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A tantalizing offer. You said you had others?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do. If this seems to be beyond your depth, I'd hate to see the coin go to someone "else, but I understand."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we are interested in more of a buffet, here today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Understood. That underground tunnel, that you've already visited, happens to be a major "artery for our smuggling business, leading straight up to the Lebenda Swamp. The Lebenda "Swamp is a useful place to lose things or people, until you need to find them. As well as a direct "route to my contacts in Berleben. We've been rather worried that no shipments have made their "way south by the river in weeks. After sending your friend up to Berleben last week, it was "discovered that our safe house and storage facility in the swamp has gone dark. One of my "men, as well as a handful of theirs in Berleben, went to investigate and never returned. Now the "swamp-folk are a superstitious lot, an unfortunate facet with working with them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like swap creatures?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And the like, I'm sure of it. My contacts in town are refusing to investigate, recounting "howls from the deep swamp. I would need you to head up to Berleben. Locate a fellow named Febron "Keyes, usually hangs around the Keystone Pub in the Puddles. The Puddles is the part of the town "that is, heh, sinking. He's my point man for shipments, and the only one who knows where our "safe house in the swamp is that hasn't gone fucking missing. Meet with him, secure the safe "house and its contents, and return to me. Consider a 250 gold piece advance and a purse of 1,750 gold "pieces upon completion. Heck, if you can handle both (laughs) and with timely mind, there might be "a bonus."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As a sidebar, should we be worried about our friend that we sent north to that area?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, where's Horris?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is all based in the swamp."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Leading to Berleben.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could you describe your friend, Vabron?

lines.name: MARISHA, LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Febron Keyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Based by his fairly emanate lack of teeth. His one "wandering left eye. A bit of a skin condition."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No grill, busted eye. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just drooled a little. Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But he's good at the work he does."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What work is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's been pressed for it a few times and has proven to be trustworthy, and I admire that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would we have the same sort of timetable for this mission, a month?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The sooner the better, as the longer these shipments continues to elude us, the more money "we're losing. Like I said, a timely manner, there may be a bonus."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Those are the two at the moment. If those don't tickle your fancy, I'm sure we could have "another opportunity in the next week or two. I just would hate to see these go to less qualified "individuals."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, perhaps we'll partake of some beverages and discuss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One more thing though, our other offer was for 10,000 gold. Seems like maybe you could match that just to make it a little bit more equal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You mistake this business as some sort of a push for an inherently equal pay, my friend. I "don't know what business the Crown wishes to offer you, but I can guarantee you it has a ceiling."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well the other side of that was that we would get access to some potions and supplies and stuff. Is this something you can provide to us when we go on missions for you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wipe a little blood from my mouth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Super endearing with that black eye.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anime sparkles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're leaning on one leg a little bit, unintentionally leaning in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your one busted eye is wandering.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Return of the Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Remember, we try not to dip into our own "contraband, but we could assume that we could provide some things, yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does that contraband include high-quality paper and ink?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can provide paper and ink, sure."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know what contraband means, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: High-quality paper and ink.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll learn him, it's all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give us some time to discuss, and we'll get back to you shortly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. Well, drink, be merry. You know where to find me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there an open booth or--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The darkest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the darkest corner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or like a bumper pool table that we can all--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is that, yeah. It's more like a shufflepuck thing, with the sand on the side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just Pacman table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Galaga.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The darkest table is the one that is tucked right inside the spiral staircase, where you enter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which normally has somebody sitting there, but at the moment, it looks like they're getting a drink. If you swipe it now you'll probably piss somebody off, but you'll get the table.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys approach, you can see the same muscular, thuggish individual with the tanned skin and the thick bracers around his rough and tumble exterior, begins to approach with a large, fully filled flagon of ale. Who stops, sees that you're sitting there and grumbles to himself and finds another seat. But you are as private as you can be in this relatively not private space. You have a table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, what do you think?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it sounds like fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, Molly, you've been talking about getting out of town.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it is out of town.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It gets us out of town.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's almost perfectly out of town. I've always wanted to go to Deadwood.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've already-- yeah. How awesome does that place sound?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shadygrove?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The shitty swamp?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shadycreek Run.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Shadycreek. Well that would be probably the second one, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: After, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am feeling greedy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you feel about it, Yasha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am along for the ride.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have no preference?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, I'm up for all of it, you know? Whatever you guys decide.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any preference to water versus, perhaps, an abundance of dry ground?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Versus both.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I mean, we're all leaning more towards this than going to the Menagerie Coast for the Empire right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it does sound like fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I don't like contracts. We already gave our blood to this guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're already in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is as contract-y as contract gets.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus, if this is as aggressive as they say it is, an attack on the border, I'm sure that legionnaire's job will be there when we return anyway. Price might have increased.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Seems like the Empire has enough money to just throw at problems. I don't think that's going to change. Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Better to bet on the underbelly rising up than the top maintaining what it has.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, this way gets us to go straight through Hupperdook.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) It does! We can stop by Hupperdook!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just saying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remind me what's in Hupperdook?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have no idea!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like a cool name for a town.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I imagine that all of the buildings look like mushrooms.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They've got a wax museum. Largest ball of twine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hupperdook?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hupperdook!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Branson of Wildemount.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Branson of Wildemount, yeah. I hope it is!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, definitely stopping in Hupperdook.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They've got a soft serve place there. It'll be great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we're going to take that shady underground river out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. We have to be careful of those monsters that came out of the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We know those monsters, though. I took care of all those traps. Could someone remind me, because when The Gentleman looks at me I get a little bit-- yeah, you know, flippity-flee?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Turned on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's it. Like

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you crushing on him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, the sweat thing bothers me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not sweat. I think it's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it's sweat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to peek around and look at the Gentleman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He's back at the far table. He's currently drinking and it looks like he has a small book of some kind that he's thumbing through.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Is he moist?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many of us are uncomfortable hearing that word?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In this low light, it's hard to see. But when you were speaking to him earlier there was a layer of general moisture across his skin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of shirt is he wearing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The shirt he's wearing now is a navy blue, linen, billowy shirt, open in the chest a bit, you can see a bit of his chest hair and frilled at the sleeves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The thing is if he was sweaty, then why would he be wearing long sleeves?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To hide all the sweat stains on his undershirt? I don't know! It's just weird, right? Like he's always sweating?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Normally when people are sweaty they're going like this: (breathing heavily)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Anyway, I missed the whole part about the swamp. What's that mission again? What do we have to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We go in, we try to find Fabron Keyes and secure the safehouse in the swamp and there's howling there so probably wolves or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But wait-- find the safehouse and do what to it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Secure it and come back and tell him where it is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Secure it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's gone dark, right? So either remove whatever's in there and get it back up and running again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And hey, DM, knowing the Empire, how direct a route is it from Fabron Keyess area, Berleben to Shadycreek Run?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a map for that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a map for that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll get it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Straight shot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have to go around some mountains right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to go around the Silberquel Ridge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's up there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so we need to go to Berleben or we need to go to the swamp, come back here and then go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have a printout?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't have a printout.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm special. Nott has a dot matrix printer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (printer noises)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a pretty good printer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Berleben. Hupperdook is over here--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And where are we?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're down there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester, do you think people who live in Hupperdook are called Dookies?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Huppers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or Huppers?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh is it this the Zubenda Swamp? Is that what it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lebenda Swamp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should call them Dookies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should call them Dookies, for sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Shadycreek Run was what area again, did you say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Quannah Breach. Northeast of Nogvurot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Northeast of what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quannah Breach. There it is. We're very close to Berleben and then it seems like quite a--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A trek.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stray, yeah, a trek to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll have to go here, come back, and then go again. Also, if we're going to go through Berleben anyway, we might as well check in on Horris.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To make sure he's, like,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are we going to do if he's not?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not tell anyone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly. Wouldn't it be better if we just don't know?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Schrödinger's Horris?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we've held up our part of the bargain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I may, Yasha? We're going to be really close to your old, you know, place where you lived?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: May I see the map just to make sure?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Xhorhas is over there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Xhorhas isn't

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's pretty big, but I mean, I'm from the south, anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, northward is not Xhorhas, technically. Just east.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Greying Wildlands are in the north.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, the Greying Wildlands are in the north.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's the Greying Wildlands. Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If there is a chance to look in on Horris, if it is easy, if it doesn't put us out, you know? If it's put right in front of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, if he's there. I just don't want to go out of our way looking for him and all of a sudden have the guilt of, you know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's true. I hate guilt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, don't get me wrong, I like our efforts here in the city. I think we've done good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hard to keep track of parties outside of our purview.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am over Zadash.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Just over it, huh? Plus, it'll give us time to leave? Maybe things will change by the time we come back? Or maybe not. We'll see. Never know what happens outside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're going to take them all? Hop on both of his offers, I think?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, quite frankly, I am a little more comfortable in Quannah Breach anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're more nomadic?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's do it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's do it, yeah. We'll pound our drinks; keep them away from Beau because she'll drink all of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want to make sure we're here for a full hour, though. I'm going to drink slowly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can use a little-- yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to sip it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The exhaustion point lasts until you take a long rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't get an exhaustion point, you just become stunned for a round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For a round, it's gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For the Haste?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You're fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just a pain in the ass in combat, not in out of combat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! Once it wears off you're like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you get a point of exhaustion after Haste.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It just stuns you for one round. Which in combat is really bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll leave Molly and Jester here to nurse their drinks and their short rests and we'll go back up and speak to the Gentleman. No?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, of course. I'll come with you, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Anybody that's not nursing a short rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm nursing a short rest.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll go with you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I will as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to be able to heal enough to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I going to be able to heal enough what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For going down river. Or, well, I suppose it's going to be--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll just use the one little spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll be all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's, well-- your hit points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is Sorad the female goliath?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh. Sorah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorah. Is she present in the tavern at the moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's actually sitting at the table in the-- or sitting at the bar 15 feet away from him, but she's always in his direction. She's perpetually hawking his presence and ensuring that nobody tries anything funny and that she can get there quickly if she needs to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. I will approach.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's in the process of thumbing through a small book. He's finishing a sip from his goblet and watches you push. "Ah. That was quicker than I anticipated."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed. We have good news. We have decided to take you up on your offer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Which one?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Lebenda Swamp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Lebenda Swamp

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. And you're not choosing the Shadycreek Run?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, will you be reassigning it very quickly if we don't take it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I need it to be taken care of so if you won't do it I'll find somebody else who can."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm-mm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Time is of the essence here."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the Lebenda one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. I thought we were doing the beginner's course?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to do that one and then the other one! We'll say yes to both.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we're doing both?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we'll hope we can do both. Can we do both?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You can indeed. If you do both, I'll be happy to reward you with something nice at the end "of it because that's quite a feat."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Well, I'm happy to know we're doing business together once more. I would "recommend, if you're heading to Berleben and Lebenda Swamp to take the Bromkiln Byway. We do "have the river, but one, you have quite a number of individuals that aren't the most quiet, and "there are certain things that exist throughout that 70-ish mile journey you'd be taking underground."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: By water or also on foot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Either way, it's still 70 miles to Berleben. That's a long journey to take "underground if you are--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not quiet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not quiet and inconspicuous. Our smuggling run usually goes in groups of two to three at most "to keep it quick and unseen."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When you say "underground," are you speaking metaphorically, or do you literally have a way underground to get there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You've already been there."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The river goes that far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The passage that we were in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we took that for an hour, not 70 miles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Which is why I'm saying, if you choose to otherwise, that's up to you, but I would recommend "taking above ground on the Bromkiln Byway. It's a well-carried road. It sees a lot of foot traffic, "shouldn't be that dangerous, and it's nearly a straight shot to the swamp."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll stay high and dry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What would we have to be wary of in the river?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whatever decides to take up residence down there."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we still have the cart, and the two horses?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course we have the cart and the two horses, yeah. We have the cart, at least.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have five horses, if I recall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have horses. Horses for days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Crapper, Shitter, W.C., Toilet, John.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wrote them down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're unfortunately a little short on transportation. We could use a few horses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Seeing as how you're accepting both, that would put you in the business of acquiring the "advance from both, so that would be-- Dweez! Please retrieve the advances. 750." There's a brief break before you hear the familiar chuckling, and three large sacks are put up onto the table. "750 gold. The advances for both missions."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Outstanding. Jester did have an excellent question. We'll need certain remedies, especially near the water. Anything that you can provide that might put us in an advantageous position would be most appreciated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Dweez, gather what we can spare from the supply cabinet, please." He wanders off for a moment, and comes back with two small, over-the-shoulder satchels. He sets them on the table. (chuckling) Opens the little lids for them and pushes them forward. You watch as one of them falls forward and clattering out a few inches or so, some vials in there. "The one on the right "should be able to tend to any wounds you sustain along the journey. The one on the left can aid "you, should you find yourself pricked with some terrible disease."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Poison and healing, got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Disease, not poison. Unfortunately, we have not that."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One of each.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two vials in one of healing. They're both of greater healing. The other one is cure disease.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Paper and ink?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can provide you with paper and ink, should you be so interested. Dweez?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Didn't you buy a fuckton of paper and ink? You've used it all?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've used it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you know what is also as valuable as resources, is knowledge. In this swamp area, are there any particular hazards that we should keep an eye out for that your men have seen repetitively?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "None that I've cared to remember. That would be more of a question to my ally there, if "you don't mind. Speak with Febron. He is very familiar with the area and can give you the "information you seek."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wouldn't presume to be as lucky as to have Louis have tried this mission before and fucked it up as well, has he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I would not ensure such a mission to him." He glances past you, in the far corner you can see him now leaning over the bar, two full cups in, starting to get a little dazed on the stool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Louis! Fuck you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His hand does this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, he's a winner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You will get 107 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anything else you require?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. This has really whet our appetite.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Swamp pun?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just can't stop staring at his face, it's soaking wet! Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway, if our business is complete. I appreciate your patronage, I look forward to our "continued partnership, and I wish you all the luck."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't sweat the small stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb hangs back all by himself and says: (stuttering) Paper and ink?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dweez comes up from behind a moment later with a stack of regular parchment and ink. He hands it over. It does not look like it would be the necessary enchanted or prepared inks that you could use to scribe spells per se, but it's parchment and ink.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, danke.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is very exciting, two missions at once.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well one and then-- Oh, I run back to The Gentleman. Should we come back here after the first part or should we continue on and take care of them both and then come tell you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's up to you, I can't pay you unless you come back, but if you complete them both, and "do so in ample time, I'll be happy to pay you when you return from both. Just send word, if you "could, upon clearing our safehouse."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That way you know we did it timely and we can get that bonus part.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Precisely."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Thank you very much. Good luck."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just going to leave a handkerchief. Just in case.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He just glares at you. Glowering at Nott as you all step away from his corner of the chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, it's still a really good time in the day we should go ahead and make preparations. Make our way back up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're already ready to leave at a moment's notice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we already packed our rooms up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's nothing at Pumat's anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No more Pumat's.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've almost cleared out-- Between you and other patrons in the recent weeks, they've cleared him out. It's not an endless emporium.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As we pass that big ogre on the way out I say: Kutha, keep it real, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do that, he turns around and a hand slaps onto your shoulder, the finger and thumb of it go from the front of your chest to your small back as it grapples you and spins you around and goes (grunts) and then releases you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a big hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As I leave, I flick the Wand of Smiles at him again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking Kutha can't catch a break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he peels his large mitt off of Fjord's body and grunts, he turns to the rest of the chamber.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter and pained yelling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He starts pulling at his jaw. It's almost like getting a charlie horse where you can't stop the muscles and he tries to stop it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The Wand of Smiles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now I feel guilty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eh, he probably deserved it. You guys ascend the stairs back into the main front of The Evening Nip, and the rest of the afternoon is yours. What would you like to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, we can head over to the cart and horses.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we just get that started, and we'll go?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to run over to Pumat's to buy some paper and ink.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: More?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Caleb is just--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I join Caleb, because I went pee last time when you guys went to go to Pumat's.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, there's nothing there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's cleared out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, there's some things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah, shit there are four more!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Massacre in downtown Zadash this afternoon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As you run off I say: Meet us at the cart and horses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Super fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys charge over to the Pentamarket, you make your way to the exterior of The Invulnerable Vagrant. Stepping inside, there is a rather chill, customer-less interior, as two of the regular Pumats sit at the front. As you step into the chamber, "Oh you're back so soon. I "figured you had completed all your intended means of purchasing."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can go ahead and look. You're starting to really diminish our stockpile."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh,

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get 30 gold worth of incense at your disposal, and the 100 gold worth of enchanted inks and scribing materials and paper that you can utilize to make those notes and transition it into a spellbook.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anything that you wanted to purchase while we are here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A little birdy told me there might be bracers here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's hard to have a shop without inventory."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bracers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, yeah. Right over here." Goes and pulls one of the boxes from the shelves. It has a glass top and he presents it to you. There's a velvet interior with two little alcoves inside where these very beautiful, silver bracers with scrolling and runic sigils carved into it across the band are present, "These would make a better defensive capability for someone who does not "themselves partake in the use of armor."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. I don't partake in the use of armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, that sounds like it's meant to be."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh. How much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "1200 gold pieces."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit, Pumat! The fuck?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll come back when I'm fucking rich, aight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, they'll be here waiting for you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy shit, Pumats.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit, Pumats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you." "Thank you." "Thank you." "Thank you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't have fucking 1200 gold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do you have 1200 gold?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't want to know how much I have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I apologize, didn't mean to send you into an existential financial crisis. But it's a really "powerful enchantment and--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm always in an existential crisis. I'm going to go now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fair enough. Okay well, Pumat Prime worked very hard on those. When you come back to get them "I think you'll be very happy with amount that you've spent to keep yourself alive."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are very appreciative and I don't know if you have already, but you should look into some sort of membership card or frequent customer points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stamp punch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll go ahead and bring it up with the big guy himself."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten visits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine potions, the tenth one's free.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fantastic."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thousand gold's worth of paper and the 11th ream is free. We'll go now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. Okay, thank you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We go. Very quickly. Bolt over to the cart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys hastily make your way to the cart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know that little boost you had back there in your fist fight with the blue one? You're welcome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you fucking slip something into my drink, Caleb? What the fuck, man?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast-- That was arc-- That was a spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Dude, that shit was awesome. Yeah, I was into it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You scratch my back, I will scratch yours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The others are on a mission, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you guys gather the carts and the horses you have at your disposal. Prepared yourself for exit from the town. Eventually Caleb and Beauregard catch up to the rest of you. What would you like to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's riding on the cart first?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't need to. I'd feel weird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you just going to walk?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have horses, you can ride a horse.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well yeah, I'll ride a horse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two horses pulling the cart? Or two and three solos?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who is good to be lookout while the others?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do four horses pulling the cart and two solo?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two horses pulling the cart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many horses do we have?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six. We have six horses.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have six horses.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have six horses?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Only five of them have names. We never came up with a name for the sixth horse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll drive the cart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Loaf. How about Loaf?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Loaf is a good name. We have: WC, Lou, John, Crapper, Toilet, and Loaf.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Two horses pulling the cart, and four solos?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester said she's riding in the cart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll drive the cart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who else wants to be on the cart?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to be on the cart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want it as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take Water-Closet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take Loaf.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: W.C.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the name of the horse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right, sorry. I'll take a horse as well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll take a horse as well, because you guys are all in the cart, yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yasha, will you hold this for me? I put Frumpkin on her shoulder and start transcribing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (sneezes)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keep that demon cat away from me. El gato es el diablo, all right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I give him a pet. But is it real? I don't understand because sometimes it just poofs, you know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is a real cat.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am not trying to make you upset or anything, just sometimes it goes away then it comes back. I'm confused.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin can be here or Frumpkin can be there, and right now he is here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I touch him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He would like you to touch him, yeah. But respectfully.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When someone kicks him and he poofs, does he automatically go to the other place or does he die for a little bit and come back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I think it's pretty instantaneous and honestly I am so glad to have him, but I think that it is probably nicer on the other side. Does your mother ever read stories about the Feywild and sprites and blumpkins? That's not the word.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My mother never did, but the Traveler told me lots of stories.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of the Feywild?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of everywhere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Feywild? Is it like another city?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's another plane of existence that is a mirror slightly off of our own. With us, but apart from us at all times.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's faeries, and that is how the unicorns get over here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One thing at a time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's making a very strange noise right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's it sound like?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (purring)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That means he likes you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you not have cat where you grew up?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I have heard of cats, but Frumpkin is one of the first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did they have dogs?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only rats that they ate.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's true, we have lots of rats. We have many creatures.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have wolves?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did you keep as pets?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We didn't really have any.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You didn't have any pets?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But I like him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I tell Frumpkin to nestle in and he starts doing that thing where they claw their way in when they're getting cozy. It hurts, but it's also lovable at the same time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Making biscuits!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for kitty biscuits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pure death. Fucking anaphylactic shock.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I stop talking to everybody and I start transcribing things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I guess I'll take the lead and we'll make our way out the city. Heading northeast, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: North.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: To the Swamp!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To the Bronchial Byway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Bromkiln, yeah. The Bronchial Byway, the life breath of the land.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We ruin everything Matt creates.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sometimes you do make them bulletproof and we get mad. But most of the time, we can crack the code.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Being here for a while, it seems strange, but also welcoming to be back on the open road for a moment. You glance around and take a deep breath as that clean post-rain air still seems to linger in the vicinity. As you make a sweep on the horizon, with the rolling hills and patches of trees, catch your vision off to the far east on the outside of the Signet Wall district, you see hundreds if not thousands of soldiers, all gathered and making their way east in small troops. Here the mainstay source, the bulk of military power in the center of the Empire makes its way to war. You see horses, siege engines, and large ballista on wheels all being carried and prepared for the journey to the borders of Xhorhas and beyond. With that, you pick up and continue northward, making your way long the Amber Road, towards to where the Bromkiln Byway carves off to your destination. First, I want to ask you guys: what pace are you travelling at? You can go slow pace if you try to be super stealthy. Normal pace is fine. Fast pace you go quickly, but you threaten exhaustion if you continue to push that way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we'll go at a regular pace until we get to the Bromkiln Byway. At the Amber Road, we should be all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the cart and the horses, you're looking at about 30 miles a day at a normal pace. You're probably looking at two nights' stay on the road before you reach your destination.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would you like to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's nighttime now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet someone's going to try to jump out at us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should not let them do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They do that to people that are on the open road.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would you tell me that? Now I'm very scared!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any tree clusters or rock clusters or boulders or anything that provides shelter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At your current location? Make a perception check with disadvantage because it is nighttime.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm the wrong person to be doing this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say I was hoping to find the same thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I put on the goggles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then you can both make individual rolls, or one of you can aid the other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll aid you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take your advantage on your roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope. That was a two with advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did you roll, a one and a two?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A two and a one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the night has fallen and you spend the better part of the next hour trying to look for any physical representation of safety or cover, it is just open rolling hills and field.
