lines.text: Oh. Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that you next to him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I can't use my crossbow as a melee-- no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it doesn't work that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I do a hand punch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, I'll let you do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength bonus, not dexterity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Strength bonus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One damage plus your strength modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My unarmed strike says plus three to hit for some reason. I have no idea why.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your strength modifier?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do one point of damage to it as you slug it in the back of the head, it runs off the board in this direction. This one is going to run this way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do. Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's five points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It keeps running, charges this direction. The ogre right now, being surrounded and watching the rest of its fellows run away, is backing up and looking, "Where Emmett?!" Oh yeah, thank you. He's blocked from my position. He is going to, seeing everything else fleeing, scatter as well. Just runs off the map. That finishes their go. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay, I'm going to start muttering under my breath and stretch out two hands and send two Magic Missiles: one at the one that ran that way, and two at this one, and two at the one that ran that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're casting it at level two?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm casting it at level two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so it's two missiles each. Go ahead and roll damage. 1d4 plus one per missile.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so the one that was near Nott is three and seven for that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gets hit by both, continues to run. He's wounded, but still alive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Verdammt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven for this one? The one that's running past Molly, both missiles hit it from two different sides, and his head pops open from both sides of the force damage hitting it. Its body runs for like three more steps before it (boom) onto the ground on its own.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will just stay put.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, finishing Caleb's go. Fjord, you're up. Molly, you're on deck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing. I'm going to use my bonus action to cast Hex on that tall--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (Texan accent) Drink of water?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. On that waterfall of ugliness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You have your sword in your hand, and the shield.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. I'll drop the sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you drop the sword. Cast Hex to strike this fellow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will send two bursts of Eldritch Blast in its direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. Roll damage for each.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's eight and six and 1d6. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do that twice because you hit it twice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 points of damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll see them whaling on that big fucker and I release the falchion and send two across the way at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take it as a pet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Fjord's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run towards the horses, where they came off to the left, and as I pass that wolf, I'm going to take a couple swipes at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's an 18 and a 17 roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, roll some damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's just see what that does, before I see if I even take a third shot. That's (counting) 18 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wolf is misted.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to keep heading towards the cart to see if that goblin is still there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Molly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get right up next to Beau and that's the extent of it there. That ends your turn, Molly? Ogres are done. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. I'm going to turn and chase the goblin that ran away from me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start giving chase?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You run; you see him. You get up to this point and you can see where he is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far away is he?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It would've been about 60 feet away from you if he used his action to dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's 60 feet away from you. He's right where he is, essentially, and you got that far. He's 30 feet from you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, with 30 feet, I will take a shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a 20-something

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Just one, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage to him. All right, he has seven from him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He had seven from the magic missile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, magic missile. Yeah, that's enough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus a one point punch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You release the crossbow. It falls to the ground, breathing hard and tries to stand up, falls down to its knee again, and then collapses on the ground, no longer moving.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cool. I can't see the other one that went towards the horses, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, not at the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'm going to use my bonus action to dash closer to the body to see if I can recognize this goblin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You move up to it. We'll get to that next round. For the narrative purposes of this, nothing is currently engaging you in combat. The wolf that is on death's door is currently unconscious and bleeding out from the spell that you gave it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would have said if we'd gotten around to it that if I could go another 30 feet in this direction, if I could still see the last goblin that went this way, I would fire off more magic missiles to finish it. But that's only if I can see it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check with disadvantage, because it is dark and at night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Terrible. Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the purposes of ease here, you've managed to finish off the wolf that's currently unconscious really quickly. Molly, you're standing next to it and it's on the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, yeah, and I'm heading my way because I saw that one run off to the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had the bonus action, because you didn't use it. You're going to run up and put it out of its misery. You guys gather at this point, and with your wounds, the poison still (throbbing) in your veins for both you and Caleb. Around the corner, you see there's the horse cart, about 30 to 40 feet from where you are, and there's one goblin grabbing a bunch of sacks. He's like, (excited panting). He turns around and sees all of you standing there in the clearing, and goes--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Drop it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes into a full sprint in the opposite direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Magic Missile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage. Level one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. Let's do level three.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With a Vicious Mockery, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 12, so I think it succeeds. It's unfortunate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Might as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, silence falls upon the field. Your cart regained and the goblin running off spooks the horses a bit and they pull the cart another ten feet or so, but they eventually slow down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Go scrape that up off the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Who wants to go with me to go get our stuff?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was already on my way there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is it gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her eyes come back to normal color. The white tips of her hair return.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You feeling okay?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If you sometimes startle me out of my sleep, it happens. Sorry. I got startled and I got mad immediately because I saw him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You had--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you an angel?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You had wings.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I guess. It just happens. I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some people have sleep apnea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Is that a Xhorhasian thing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not that I know of. I was the only one who had this thing. I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At home, you mean? You were the only one of your family that had it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you fly?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasp)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you tried?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only when you're really angry?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, sometimes I get really angry, you know? Don't you wake up and get off on the wrong side of the cot, and someone startles you awake? I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb, in Celestial, says: No, but really, are you an angel?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I reply back in Celestial.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I say: Well, of sorts, I guess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you say?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're speaking a language.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't know you spoke this language.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a secret nerdy language you wouldn't understand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god, what are they talking about?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's really--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Continuing in Celestial.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want us to leave the table?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to do it now or later?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think he's hitting on her. I can't tell, but--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, I will tell you, but-- I will tell everyone, it's fine, but should we clean up or, I don't know, something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's gesturing an awful lot, I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, maybe she's angry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Her face looks angry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's nothing around, right? Perception check?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just us!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just all of us staring at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a ten. Besides you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see anything. You seem to be relatively alone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull down my Spiritual Weapon and start licking it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It tastes like wolf and ogre.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Only the parts that hit the wolf and the ogre.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In Celestial: The blue one is getting pouty, we better switch back to Common.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He seems passive, I don't know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, let's do it because I've-- We'll talk about it, I promise, I just, let's just-- we'll talk about it, I promise. Okay? Hello.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Hello!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's nice to talk with someone who has, you know, language from--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Xhorhas?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What language is that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Xhorhasian, I think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's less a Xhorhasian language, and more one that you're not quite certain why you understand it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, it's Xhorhasian, so it's amazing that you know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb, you're very--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well-read.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a spy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At this point, am I back with all of the gold and all of the sacks?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, from--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did I look at the goblins?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Over 20. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't recognize them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I find anything interesting on the body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Short bows, scimitars, grungy, some of them coated with excrement and other things to make them nasty when they carve through and infect wounds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about the big old weapons that the two bruisers were-- are they massive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Large greatclubs that are carved.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did he say excrement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On some of the scimitars. They look nasty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they wearing underwear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (horrified yelling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But there are a few pouches that haven't been spilled or utilized entirely of toxin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of toxin? Can I grab those?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that investigation check, you manage to pull five vials of toxin, unused. Each one has a single use on some sort of a weapon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five vials of toxin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to draw that in my journal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'm going to rejoin the group.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, not that that wasn't terribly exciting. Still crazy dark out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's middle of the night, maybe one or two in the morning.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks for catching that, you two. If that had snuck up on us, we would have been super fucked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gods, can you imagine what would have happened if they were all over us when we woke up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we would have been paste. Caleb, Nott, thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott, did you recognize any of those goblins?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which is not surprising, since we operated not in this area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you hang out with ogres, too?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we did not. I've heard of goblins hanging out with ogres before, and I don't think they're too dissimilar. But we didn't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott, are you okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it weird to fight other goblins?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was very rewarding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. You liked it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. I'm only sad that one got away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott, do you share the same hatred in yourself?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You seem to hate your kind quite a lot. I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I hate myself? No, I'm cool. I mean, she had wings, so you want to talk about that instead?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we can. Yeah, hey.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You seem real excited to hurt your own kind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not just that. This feels wrong, like I should be in a different body. The way they act, and the way they are. It's just not me. They do horrible things to people, and they seem fine with it, but I don't know. I never felt the same as them. It's not that I don't like myself or anything; I think I'm okay. But I just don't like how I feel when I see my hands or my feet. They just feel wrong. I want to be different.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Was there anyone you were close to?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not in my clan, no. But there was someone. I think I was telling you before that they give you a job as soon as you're able to do one. They tried me on so many different jobs. But I was not a soldier, I was not a good cook, I wasn't good at sewing or building. So they stuck me with the torturer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wasn't the torturer. I was the torturer's assistant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you were

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. I saw a lot of things, and there was a halfling village not far away. They captured someone from the village and they wanted me to kill him. But instead, I was kind to him, and he started talking. My fellow gobbies didn't like that, but they allowed it because I was getting valuable information about where the halflings kept their food, and where they went to harvest, and where we could attack them. But I became friends with him. He was nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What happened to him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I hope he got away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you leave before he did?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We left together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Really?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was his name?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not important. He was just a nice man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you love him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. He was a chemist, so he taught me about alchemy, and liquids, and potions and things. And he taught me his language. When he had taught me everything he could, they said to kill him. But I didn't want to, so I got

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was the distraction?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I shot one of my fellow goblins in the butt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He yelled a lot. Then we ran off in separate directions, and I've been running ever since.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where would he go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I assume back to his village.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But your goblin friends knew where the village was.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I know, but I don't know, I can't go to that village. I'll be stoned to death.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why? But you helped him!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a goblin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if we went with you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could maybe go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we cast Disguise Person on you, and you could find out if he was okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we're going the opposite direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if after we do this, we go down there and see?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know if we should go back. There's too many bad people around there. What if I run into the tribe? What if someone from the village sees me? They hate goblins.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you see what Yasha just did though?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that was freaky deaky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just killed two ogres and some wolves, and a bunch of other goblins. We could probably do some serious damage to your old, mean tribe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott, there are bad people everywhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Doesn't mean you have to associate yourself with them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just because you look like them, doesn't mean that you have to be like them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you're one of us now. And aren't we great?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's that creepy smile again, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying real hard to not make it super scary.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it is a good idea to go there, when we are finished.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm okay for now, just getting away from them has been wonderful. And I've met you, Caleb, and you don't seem to care how I look or who I was.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do not care. I know who you are now. If you don't want to go back there, we don't have to go back there. But if you actually do, don't be afraid to ask. I will go with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think we all will.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we're all a little bit of an island of misfits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Knowing all that, you showed a lot of bravery tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott the Brave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe there is a comma.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: You earned your comma.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just call it a hyphen for now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gradual steps.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And maybe we'll move to an ellipsis or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Working our way through syntax.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nott, I'm very sorry we made fun of you eating children.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're terrible in every way. If you're not good, they cut you, or kill you or throw you away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, so you ran away?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As fast as I could.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What got you locked up with this guy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Being me. I think I was probably stealing some food or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You told me it was cherry wine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, it was booze.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cherry wine's real good though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you know they're not wrong, right? The people who arrested me are not incorrect. If you see a goblin, you should kill it on sight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe not, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe some of them are nice like you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely not. None of them are.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You can't be the only one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have never met another nice one. Ever. And I really tried!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In your tribe. Have you gone to other tribes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you were just in a really shitty tribe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It feels like I was in a very average tribe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There could be enlightened tribes out there, committed to changing their ways.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be fine for them, but like I said, this is not me. I don't want to be this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's fine. You're with us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm never going to be cool with this. Ever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's super inspiring in a weird way. It's all like super relevant. Just throwing it out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a crack of thunder. The rain begins to come down as one of the slowly encroaching storms begins to pour down in the middle of the night.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm picking up all the stuff. This has been very enlightening. There is probably going to be lightning. Anyone else who wants to join me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if we will all fit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll snuggle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm all right in the rain.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Same.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm okay in the rain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Too much water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to make a little camp underneath the cart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if I can sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need to sleep. I got injured.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take the next watch.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can take the first watch. I'd like to stay outside for a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take the first-- oh wait.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who had-- did you-- were you doing it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Boulders, parchment, shears for first watch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, y'all got it. I'm just up anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to sleep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Join me under the cart?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we on? What's going on?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're arguing about who's going to take the first watch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can sleep in the rain or under the cart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could finish the watch that we didn't really finish.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, let's do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why don't you take the next one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taking the final watch? Roll perception for me if you don't mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A band of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage for the darkness.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I say something short to Nott before we switch to the last?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When you are ready.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I tasted a baby once, just once. I didn't know, they were handing around a bowl. I didn't know what was in it, and then later somebody said there was like-- I mean, they put a bunch of different meat in there. How was I supposed to know that it was like a goulashy thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who am I to judge?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I fall asleep in the mud and rain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't roll yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: More ogres and goblins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we will end tonight's episode.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five more hours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just live here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If I didn't have anything to do tomorrow. If I wasn't flying to Canada tomorrow, I could keep going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, you have a thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did I miss that in the announcements?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think you did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just don't pay attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He was too busy with his own. Anyway, thank you guys. We'll pick this up next week on Thursday from there, as we have about a day's worth of travel before you get there. With enough speed, you will get there before the next dusk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six more battles before we get there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
